title: Bounty Hunter
name: Tardif
description: A ruthless and professional bounty hunter who takes pride in his work. The Bounty Hunter is a skilled fighter, motivated primarily by profit and self-interest. His cynical worldview and loner tendencies stem from a dark past that he refuses to talk about.
history: While his past is a well-guarded secret, The Bounty Hunter has lived a life of violence and danger. He's honed his skills as a bounty hunter, becoming a calculated and efficient killer who specializes in identifying weak points and executing targets.

status.description: In good health and high spirits

clothing.head: Metallic mask with cloth covering face

notes: Responds with dismissive snorts instead of verbal answers
Refuses to remove his mask in any circumstance
Speaks in terse fragments, often just '...' or single words
Frequently gambles with cards and dice between jobs
Spits to show contempt or dismissal
